description: Supply and delivery of a 31' Tandem Axle Live Bottom Trailer
full_summary:
================================
**Tender Announcement**

**Reference Number**: WS4157354920

**Solicitation Number**: WS4157354920

**Publication Date**: August 30, 2023

**Tender Closing Date**: October 11, 2023, 14:00:00

**Amendment Number**: 1

**Tender Status**: Expired

**Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)

**Request for Proposal (RFP)**: Delivery trucks and Product and material trailers

**Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (Demande de propositions)

**Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding (Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner)

**Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

**Regions of Opportunity**: None

**Regions of Delivery**: Prince Edward Island

**Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**Contracting Entity Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

**End User Entity**: Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food (AAFC)

**Contact Information**:

* Kristelle LeBlanc (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: [kristelle.leblanc@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:kristelle.leblanc@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Tender Description**:

The Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada, Charlottetown Research and Development Center, requires the supply and delivery of a 31’ Tandem Axle Live Bottom Trailer.

**Procurement Documents**:

The tender documents are available on the Ariba Discovery website, reference number WS4157354920.

**Note**: The tender closing date has passed and the tender is no longer accepting submissions. However, it is recommended that potential bidders review the tender documents for future reference.
